channel.title: Kernel on 驩讙懽歡
channel.description: Recent content in Kernel on 驩讙懽歡

item.title: CentOS 6 更换内核
item.description: 查看 CentOS 版本 $ cat /etc/issue 查看内核版本 $ uname -a 下载需要更换的内核 $ wget http://ftp.scientificlinux.org/linux/scientific/6.6/x86_64/updates/security/kernel-2.6.32-504.3.3.el6.x86_64.rpm 安装内核 $ rpm -ivh kernel-2.6.32-504.3.3.el6.x86_64.rpm --force 重启 $ reboot
